channel.title: Zenith how to make custom yells
channel.description: Hello i have a zenith source and im loving it but 1 problem i would like a custom yell i am owner at the moment but i have (player) yell if anyone knows how to change teply, thanks

item.title: Zenith how to make custom yells
item.dc:creator: @deadlyhorror deadlyhorror
item.description:
@deadlyhorror wrote:

if (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("Deadlyhorror")) { players.getPackets().sendGameMessage( "<col=7CFC00>[Main-Owner] <img=4><col=7CFC00>" + player.getDisplayName() + ": </col><col=FF00FF>" + message + "</col>");

look for that

Read full topic
item.source: Zenith how to make custom yells

item.title: Zenith how to make custom yells
item.dc:creator: @Brooklynn Brooklynn
item.description:
@Brooklynn wrote:

look in your commands.java there should be a ::yell command, if it says ignorecase(______) put your name in there for owner and the other ones should be there. its pretty easy

Read full topic
item.source: Zenith how to make custom yells
